column1: I have experience in supply chain, factory managing and purchasing for 20 years. I worked with customers and vendors in Asia, Europe, the USA and the UK among others. I was responsible for keeping contacts and coordination of activities in an international environment with different cultures.
NTN imports medical surgery devices from USA, Europe, China, Taiwan, South Korea and Israel and sells to Thai hospitals.
Purchasing manager, Import and export management  (2014-2018)
Oishifood is the bakery. It employs about 100 persons.  GMP/ HACCP and FMCG

This company is one of leading manufacturers of figurines and gift items, produced from porcelain, resin, bronze and pewter. Customers are Disney Classic in USA for Disney items, Royal Doulton in UK for Harry Potter items and popular English ladies figurines, Goebel Porzellanfabrik in Germany, Hallmark Inc. (USA) for Hallmark items.
This company is mainly an export / domestic sales  business  in the decorative item and gift market.
I worked as a marketing and design and product development manager.
My main responsibility was marketing, export and product development.
l have a Netherlands residence permit.
Working allowed free from restriction and work permit not required.
Verblijfstitel (regulier bepaalde tijd) valid until 20-07-2023. TWV niet vereist.
I will apply for Dutch citizenship in the future.
I moved to the Netherlands in August 2018.
My main activity has been learning the Dutch language and I do a volunteer job.
